Detailed Description

'multiply matrix by a scalar' operation

Definition at line 54 of file op_scalar_misc_proto.hpp.


Static Public Member Functions

template<typename T1>
static void apply (basic_mat< typename T1::elem_type > &out, const op_data< T1, op_scalar_times > &in)
 Multiply all elements of a matrix by a scalar and store the result in a dense matrix.
template<typename T1, typename T2, typename glue_type>
static void apply (basic_mat< typename T1::elem_type > &out, const op_data< glue_data< T1, T2, glue_type >, op_scalar_times > &in)
 Evaluate glue_data<T1,T2,glue_type>, and then multiply each element of the result by a scalar. Store the final result in a dense matrix.

template<typename T1, typename T2>
static void apply (basic_mat< typename T1::elem_type > &out, const op_data< glue_data< T1, T2, glue_schur >, op_scalar_times > &in)
 Evaluate A % B (where % is the element-wise multiply operation) and then multiply each element of the result by a scalar. Store the final result in a dense matrix.
